sentences.english: Prime Minister Ted Heath takes Britain into the European Community

sentences.english: The Restoration is an important transformable age in the history of finance and taxation in England .

1759年的今天，英國佔領魁北克城。

sentences.english: The torch will travel the length of Britain during its 70-day relay.

sentences.english: Once he took us to be photographed with him in some big English photographic studio.
sentences.chinese: 有一次，他帶我們到一個很大的英國照相館裏去照相。

sentences.english: Britain has fallen behind Japan in shipbuilding.
sentences.chinese: 在造船方面英國已落到日本後頭了。

sentences.english: Under government policy, British nuclear submarines carry a maximum of 48 warheads.

sentences.english: Seldon the Master of Wellington College, one of the most prestigeous schools in the UK.

sentences.english: The non-energy resources are not abundant in Britain, It mainly dependent on imports of industrial raw materials.
sentences.chinese: 英國的非能源資源不豐富，主要工業原料依賴進口。

sentences.english: British nationalism ebbs and flows in its intensity.
